Tolkien-related events that took place in 1906.

content.title: August
content.content: 5 - John Huston, who would voice Gandalf in The Hobbit and The Return of the King, is born.

content.title: November
content.content: 11 - Theodore Isidore Gottlieb, who would voice Gollum in The Hobbit (1977 film) and The Return of the King, is born.

content.title: December
content.content:
5 - Otto Preminger, who would play the Elvenking in The Hobbit (1977 film), is born.
Years
1903 1904 1905 1906 1907 1908 1909
